text: Greta Santhagens-Manders (11 February 1891 — 23 June 1976) was a Dutch opera singer from The Hague. She had a large number of appearances with, among others, the Dutch National Opera N.V. and the Co-Operation. She had roles including Carmen and Santuzza (Cavalleria rusticana). She had Wagner roles of Brangäne in 'Tristan und Isolde' and Venus in 'Tannhäuser', as Julietta in Offenbach's 'Les Contes d'Hoffmann' and Kundry in ‘Parsifal’. ==References== ==Other websites== *Image of her in 1926 Category:Dutch singers Category:1891 births Category:1976 deaths
title: Greta Santhagens-Manders
